post.title: samsung caliber sch r860
post.content: i bought the new samsung caliber sch r860 from metro pcs and up to day i can't make it communicate with my computer, i have used btooth and pc studio can't find it. i have used usb and it says "usb device not recognized". i downloaded the new version of pc studio, i downloaded the latest usb drivers, installed everything and still the same, it doesn't work with pc studio. is there any help out there? thanks in advance.
